qas.question: What is the sole remaining property owned by Trump Entertainment Group?
What did Trump Entertainment Group say they were considering doing with the Trump Taj Mahal?
In what year did executives at Trump Entertainment Group say they were considering selling the Taj?
Why did executives say they were considering selling the Taj?

answers.text: winding down and exiting the gaming and hotel business

qas.question: Who spoke for the Trump Entertainment Group in regards to the Taj and what might be done in the future?

context: <a4_0>Executives<a4_0/> at Trump Entertainment Resorts, whose sole remaining property will be the <a0_0>Trump Taj Mahal<a0_0/>, said in <a2_0>2013<a2_0/> that they were considering the option of <a1_0>selling<a1_0/> the Taj and <a3_0>winding down and exiting the gaming and hotel business<a3_0/>.
